response.original_title: ペンギン・ハイウェイ
response.overview: A fourth-grader investigates the mysterious reason behind the sudden appearance of penguins in his village, which is somehow related to a power from a young woman working at a dental clinic.
response.tagline: A penguin has appeared in my town.
response.title: Penguin Highway
